nodes.text: Saber 2 was the call-sign for Turr Phennir's TIE Interceptor at the Battle of Endor, as wingmate to Baron Soontir Fel's Saber 1, and bore the signature bloodstripes of the 181st Imperial Fighter Wing. The ship was assigned to protect the Avenger during the battle. Saber 2 provided the logistics for the Saber Squadron.
Although some sources claim that Saber 2 and Phennir were shot down during the Battle of Endor, he appears in the novel X-Wing: Starfighters of Adumar which is set (roughly) 13 ABY.
